reviewText: Once again David Hamilton proves his genius lies in still photography not in motion pictures. He approaches movie making with the same mindset he uses in his photography. He does not realize movies need more than just a pretty face. Yes, the girls are young and beautiful however he jumps around so quickly that one is not allowed to really enjoy their beauty. The movie itself is just a collection of senseless vignettes presented in rapid fire. I will say the best part of this DVD is the picture on the DVD jacket.
